test-case.name: op-boolean-equal2args-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal2args-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Thu Dec 16 10:48:17 GMT-05:00 2004 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:boolean-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:boolean(lower bound) $value2 = xs:boolean(lower bound) *******************************************************

test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal2args-4 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Thu Dec 16 10:48:17 GMT-05:00 2004 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:boolean-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:boolean(lower bound) $value2 = xs:boolean(mid range) *******************************************************

test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal2args-5 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Thu Dec 16 10:48:17 GMT-05:00 2004 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:boolean-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:boolean(lower bound) $value2 = xs:boolean(upper bound) *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "not(true)", "true" respectively. Use of eq operator. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-2 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "not(true)", "false" respectively. Use of eq operator. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-3 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "not(false)" ad "false" respectively. Use of eq operator. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-4
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-4 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with both operands set to "and" expressions respectively. Use of eq operator. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-5
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-5 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with left operand set to and "and" expressions with the "not" function and right operand set to "true". *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-6 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with left operand set to and "and" expressions with the "not" function and right operand set to "false". *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-7
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-7 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "fn:not(false)" and "fn:not(false)" respectively. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-8
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-8 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with with operands set to "not(false and true)" and "not(false and true)" respectively. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:not(xs:boolean("false") and xs:boolean("true")) eq fn:not(xs:boolean("false") and xs:boolean("true"))

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-9
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-9 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "(7 lt 7)" and "true" respectively. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-10
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-10 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "(7 eq 7)" and "false" respectively. Use of ge operator. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-11
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-11 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "not(7 lt 7)", "true" respectively. Use of lt operator. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-12
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-12 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with operands set to "not(7 lt 7)" and "false" respectively. *******************************************************

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-13
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-13 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with both operands set to expressions unsing multiple "eq" operators connected by an "and" expression. *******************************************************
test-case.test: ((7 eq 7) eq xs:boolean("true")) and (xs:boolean("false") eq xs:boolean("true"))

test-case.name: op-boolean-equal-14
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-boolean-equal-14 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 24, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "boolean-equal" function with both operands set to expressions unsing multiple "eq" operators connected by an "or" expression. *******************************************************
test-case.test: ((7 eq 7) eq xs:boolean("true")) or (xs:boolean("false") eq xs:boolean("true"))

test-case.name: K-BooleanEqual-5
test-case.test: ((((((((((((false() eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()) eq false()

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-equal-001
test-case.description: Name: cbcl-boolean-equal-001 Description: test equality of xs:boolean Author: Tim Mills Date: 2008-05-14
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; fn:false() eq local:is-even(17)

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-equal-002
test-case.description: Name: cbcl-boolean-equal-002 Description: test equality of xs:boolean Author: Tim Mills Date: 2008-05-14
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; not(local:is-even(13) eq local:is-even(17))

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-equal-003
test-case.description: Name: cbcl-boolean-equal-003 Description: test equality of xs:boolean Author: Tim Mills Date: 2008-05-14
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; fn:true() ne local:is-even(17)

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-equal-004
test-case.description: Name: cbcl-boolean-equal-004 Description: test equality of xs:boolean Author: Tim Mills Date: 2008-05-14
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; local:is-even(17) ne fn:true()

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-equal-005
test-case.description: test equality of xs:boolean
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; local:is-even(17) ne fn:false()

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-equal-006
test-case.description: test equal to of xs:boolean
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; not(not(local:is-even(17) eq local:is-even(16)))
